t: Send Out Your Light and Your Truth
Vindicate*pn me, O God, and defend my cause against*ld an ungodly people, from*ln the deceitful and unjust man deliver*ld me!
For*ln you are the God in whom I take refuge; why*ld have you rejected me? Why*ln do I go about mourning because*ld of the oppression of the enemy?
Send*pn out your light and your truth; let*ld them lead me; let*ln them bring me to your holy hill and*ld to your dwelling!
Then*ln I will go to the altar of God, to*ld God my exceeding joy, and*ln I will praise you with the lyre, O*ld God, my God.
Why*pn are you cast down, O my soul, and*ld why are you in turmoil within me? Hope*ln in God; for I shall again praise him, my*ld salvation and my God.
